title: Jessica Biel
summary: Jessica Claire Timberlake (née Biel /biːl/; born March 3, 1982)[3][4] is an American actress and model. Biel began her career as a vocalist appearing in musical productions until she was cast as Mary Camden in the family drama series 7th Heaven (1996–2006), in which she achieved recognition.[5] The series is the longest-running series that aired on The WB channel and the longest-running family drama in television history.[6]
